com.sun.lwuit.plaf
Class BorderBlender

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.lwuit.plaf.BorderBlender

public class BorderBlender
extends java.lang.Object

For internal use only. This class is used to apply graphical effects to a border

applyColorToBorder

public void applyColorToBorder(Border b,
                               int color,
                               com.sun.lwuit.Image[] mask)
Apply color to border. The algorithm works in a way that first the mask is used color the background and after that the border is drawn over the colored mask. In order to get a good result the border has to be semitransparent.

Parameters:
b -
color -
mask -

applyColorToBorder

public void applyColorToBorder(Border b,
                               int color)
Apply color to border.

Parameters:
b - the border to be colored
color - the color

applyColorToListItem

public void applyColorToListItem(Border listRendererFocusBorder,
                                 int color)
Apply color to a border used in list.

Parameters:
listRendererFocusBorder - the border the listitem is using
color - the color
